You're always used to being the center of attention.
When the spotlight's on you and everyone's watching, you do everything in your power to carry yourself with pride.
You can be quite the showoff, especially when it's your moment to shine.
You also tend to care a lot about your image, and will try to make sure you're on people's good side.
However, when things don't go your way, you can sometimes have a hard time pushing past it.
You can also have trouble saving face if you end up making a mistake in the moment.
A dramatic person like you will be...
